title: Authentic French onion soup
ingredients: ['2kg onions - peeled, halved and sliced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '30g butter', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '4 tablespoons cognac', '250ml dry vermouth', '2L good quality beef stock, warmed', 'salt and black pepper, to taste', '16 thin slices of baguette', '16 small slices Fontina cheese']
